thread.section_title: Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location - Pricy Though
thread.title_full: Great Location - Pricy Though - Review of Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: YorkTraveller1962
title: Great Location - Pricy Though
text:
You know what you get with a Premier Inn and this was one of the newer or newly refurbished Ines so it was very clean and fresh.
Location was excellent too, surrounded by great places to eat and drink.
Prices were steep but it depends when you go and how far in advance you book I guess. Getting towards the top end of good value now and may be tempted to look for a better bargain next time.
If you get a deal - stay though....
